text: is a platformer video game in the Sonic Rush series. It was only ever released for the Nintendo DS in 2005. The game eventually got a sequel Sonic Rush Adventure, which was released in 2007. In the game, you can play as Sonic the Hedgehog and Blaze the Cat. The game is 2D, but the characters are 3D, making the game look 2.5D. ==Reception== The game got excellent reviews, including a 9/10 from IGN, and an average of 82/100 from Metacritic. ==References== Category:2005 video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo DS-only games Category:Sega video games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Side-scrolling video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog games Category:Video games about cats Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Sonic Rush
